name: Fuel Orders Summary Report
query:
SELECT 
    name AS "Fuel Order ID",
    order_date AS "Order Date",
    truck AS "Truck",
    supplier AS "Supplier",
    required_litres AS "Required Litres",
    actual_litres AS "Actual Litres",
    status AS "Status",
    purchase_receipt AS "Purchase Receipt"
FROM `tabFuel Order`

ORDER BY order_date DESC;
